testimonials.name: Ethan Oliver
testimonials.words: Laiquah is an extraordinary individual who has left an indelible mark on my life. I had the privilege of knowing Laiquah for several years, and I can confidently say that she is one of the most talented, compassionate, and driven people I have ever met.

testimonials.name: Ganiefah Majiet
testimonials.words: Laiquah's dedication to her craft is truly remarkable. Whether it is her professional work or personal pursuits, she consistently demonstrates an unwavering commitment to excellence. Her attention to detail and willingness to go above and beyond expectations is truly inspiring. Whenever she takes on a project, she pours her heart and soul into it, ensuring that the end result is nothing short of exceptional.

testimonials.name: Laeeq Majal
testimonials.words: What sets Laiquah apart is not just her talent, but also her genuine kindness and empathy towards others. She has an innate ability to connect with people from all walks of life and make them feel seen and valued. Her generosity knows no bounds, and she is always ready to lend a helping hand or offer words of encouragement. Laiquah's presence alone has a way of brightening up any room and bringing a sense of positivity and warmth to those around her.

testimonials.name: Mish-Al Taliep
testimonials.words: In addition to her professional achievements, Laiquah is deeply passionate about making a positive impact in the world. She is actively involved in various charitable endeavors and is dedicated to creating a more inclusive and equitable society. Her advocacy for social justice and her relentless pursuit of equality is truly commendable.

testimonials.name: Rayhaan Khan
testimonials.words: Overall, Laiquah is an exceptional individual whose talent, kindness, and dedication make her a true force to be reckoned with. Her unwavering commitment to excellence, combined with her genuine compassion for others, makes her a role model for anyone aspiring to make a difference in the world. I am grateful to have crossed paths with Laiquah, and I have no doubt that she will continue to achieve remarkable things in her future endeavors.

testimonials.name: Eighton-Lee Paulse
testimonials.words: Laiquah's dedication to her goals and aspirations is truly remarkable. She possesses an unwavering drive and an incredible work ethic that sets her apart. She consistently pushes herself to achieve excellence in everything she does, whether it's her professional endeavors or personal passions. Her commitment to continuous growth and learning is evident in the way she tackles challenges and embraces new opportunities.

testimonials.name: Codi Kader
testimonials.words: Beyond her impressive achievements, Laiquah is an incredibly kind-hearted and empathetic individual. She has a genuine concern for the well-being of others and always goes above and beyond to help those in need. Her ability to connect with people on a deep level and offer unwavering support and encouragement is truly admirable. Laiquah's presence has a way of creating a positive and uplifting atmosphere wherever she goes.

projects.name: Bootstrap Project
projects.description: This is a project I built using Bootstrap, CSS, and HTML.

projects.name: Javascript Project
projects.description: My JavaScript project consists of an e-commerce website called 'Floral Enchantment.' For its development, I utilized HTML, JavaScript, CSS, and Bootstrap. The website serves as an online platform for selling flowers.

projects.name: Temperature Converter
projects.description: I created a temperature converter as a way to grasp the functioning and proper usage of JavaScript functions. The converter specifically converts temperatures from Fahrenheit to degrees Celsius. To build it, I employed Bootstrap, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

projects.name: BMI Calculator
projects.description: As part of my JavaScript exercises, I developed a BMI (Body Mass Index) calculator using CSS, HTML, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. This calculator enables users to input their weight and height to calculate their BMI, providing valuable insights into their body composition.

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: As part of my JavaScript exercises, I created a calculator application using CSS, HTML, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. The calculator allows users to perform basic arithmetic operations and features a visually appealing and responsive interface with JavaScript handling the calculations and display updates.

projects.name: Currency Converter
projects.description: As part of my JavaScript exercises, I built a currency converter application using CSS, HTML, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. The application allows users to easily convert currencies with a visually appealing and responsive user interface, powered by JavaScript for dynamic updates and currency conversion logic.

projects.name: Portfolio with Javascript
projects.description: As part of my JavaScript exercises, I developed a portfolio website using CSS, HTML, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. The website showcases my work, skills, and experiences through a visually appealing and interactive design, optimized for different devices.

projects.name: Javascript Project Redo
projects.description: I redesigned an e-commerce website using CSS, HTML, Bootstrap, JavaScript, and Vue.js to improve its appearance, create a responsive layout, implement interactive features, and provide dynamic rendering for a seamless user experience.

experience.description: I was responsible for providing customer assistance in a retail or customer-oriented environment. I helped customers find and purchase products, possess product knowledge, contribute to sales targets, handle transactions, provide excellent customer service, maintain store appearance, and receive product training.
